title: Creating a Farm Friendly to Biodiversity and Produce Safety Video

subtasks: Understand the importance of biodiversity in farming systems
Implement elements such as hedgerows and riparian zones
Encourage wildlife such as birds and bats through nesting boxes and habitat provision
Minimize produce contamination from bird droppings
Consider the equilibrium between wildlife attraction and benefits
Obtain financial assistance and technical expertise from USDA Natural Resource Conservation Service
